remarks: There is a (simple) path of length 2 from one vertex to another vertex in a friendship graph if and only if there is a (simple) path of length 2 from the other vertex back to the first vertex.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 20-Feb-2018.)
statement: frg2woteqm $p |- ( ( V FriendGrph E /\ A =/= B ) -> ( ( <. A , P , B >. e. ( A ( V 2WalksOnOt E ) B ) /\ <. B , Q , A >. e. ( B ( V 2WalksOnOt E ) A ) ) -> Q = P ) ) $.
